name: GM4 Tunnel Bores
description: Construct redstone-driven tunnel boring machines with survival-friendly mechanics.

build: execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run fill ~ ~-1 ~ ~6 ~-1 ~ polished_andesite
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run fill ~ ~ ~ ~6 ~ ~ powered_rail
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run summon furnace_minecart ~ ~0.1 ~ {CustomName:'{"text":"Tunnel Bore"}',Tags:["gm4_demo","gm4_tunnel_bores_machine"]}
